/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The sun in the background illuminates the scene, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the buildings and the greenery lining the street. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, creating a picturesque urban landscape.
